Sentencas: Syngas from the gasification process of poultry litter can be utilized as the fuel in the solid oxide fuel cell for electricity production.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: A novel combined heat and power system, integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle, is currently proposed to achieve efficient and clean utilization of poultry litter.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: The effects of biomass type for co-gasification and six operational parameters on this cogeneration system are studied.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: Results show that the total electricity production, fuel cell power output, total heat production and primary energy utilization efficiency are 162.02 kW, 141.65 kW, 52.41 kW and 44.70%, respectively.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: Co-gasification of straw and poultry litter can improve the overall system performance.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: Low water content of poultry litter is generally preferable.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: The highest primary energy utilization is achieved at equivalent air ratio of around 0.26.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: Increasing water-carbon ratio would deteriorate the fuel cell and the overall system performance.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: When the operating temperature is 950 degrees C, the energy utilization efficiency reaches the peak value.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: This energy efficiency reaches the maximum value of 44.98% at fuel utilization efficiency of 0.78.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization

Sentencas: This research provides a new solution for highvalue utilization of the low-calorific poultry litter, to achieve the sustainable utilization of wasted energy and biomass resources.
Titulo: Process modeling and analysis of a combined heat and power system integrating solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle for poultry litter utilization
